column1: The trees are very dense around here.
If I stay here, I can't see the meteors,
so I guess I'll have to fly above the trees.
I can vaguely feel the breath from a youkai.
Am I imagining things?
Hmm? There is youkai activity in this willow grove.
Ah! I see you.
A youkai who can conceal its aura.
I'm not hiding my aura.
It's only that I closed my third eye
and am acting in my subconscious.
So a youkai who has no thoughts.
You're pretty good for being able to spot me.
Well, I have been around for thousands of years.
Your presence is faint, but I can sense it.
A thousand-year youkai?
Someone like you didn't get banished underground?
This is strange.
Because if I left the forest, I would be very sad.
Also,
I have lived together with humans for some time.
So you made a compromise with humans?
Where's your pride as a youkai?
Where's yours
as one who abandoned her youkai lineage?
How can you be lecturing me when you can't even call yourself a youkai?
I'll show you the true meaning of being one of my kind!
